name: Cyber Escape (itch) (rangelsebas)
description:
Hey you, looking for a cool, frenetic and insane fps parkour game, well, you are in the right place!

it's getting late and it's time to escape.

You play as Jack, a prisoner who tries to escape from an immense and technological interconnected facility and from some guards who are chasing you.

Enter a futuristic prison never seen before, this is Cyber Escape and it's time to kick some enemies ass

This game is inspired by some games like Karlson, Ghostrunner, Destiny and Call of Duty

Controls:

The game is controlled using the keyboard and mouse. You can visualize the control scheme in the options menu

Run, Shoot and Escape!
